 3.3 - INPUT ASSISTANCE
LABELS OR INSTRUCTIONS(LEVEL A)
On accessible websites...

Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input. 

These websites...

Help users avoid and correct mistakes.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
A field for entering a date has text instructions to indicate the correct format
for the date. Iâ€™d like to know a little more
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG22/Understanding/labels-or-instructions.html#examples]

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 05 October 2023 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2023/REC-WCAG22-20231005/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
